sourcesContent:
Category::
<select id="category" [(ngModel)]="catid" name="category">
  <option *ngFor="let cat of categories" [value]="cat.id">{{cat.name}}</option>
</select>

MinPrice:Price:<input type="number" [(ngModel)]="minprice">

MaxPrice:Price:<input type="number" [(ngModel)]="maxprice">

MinRating:Price:<input type="number" [(ngModel)]="minrating">

<button (click)="loadProduct()">Show</button>
